name: ctool
description: 程序开发常用工具 chrome / edge / firefox / utools / windows / linux / mac
author: baiy

scripts.initialize: pnpm --filter ctool-config run build && pnpm --filter ctool-adapter-base run build && pnpm -r run adapter-build
scripts.check: pnpm run initialize && pnpm --filter ctool-core run check
scripts.dev: pnpm run initialize && pnpm --filter ctool-core run dev
scripts.build: pnpm run initialize && pnpm --filter ctool-core run build
scripts.release: node release.js && pnpm run build && pnpm -r run platform-release
scripts.vercel-build: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter ctool-site run build
